detailsData.title: Client-Focused Approach

detailsData.title: Efficient & Effective
detailsData.content: Meeting and exceeding clients' needs with remarkable results.

address: 315 W. 9th Street, Suite 1200, Los Angeles, CA 90015
subHeading: We are trial attorneys, we are litigators and we are advisors.
valueProp: Zweiback, Fiset & Zalduendo is a premiere law firm comprised of elite attorneys representing a wide range of clients including public officials, high net-worth individuals, corporate executives, Fortune 500 companies, and government entities. We have over 50 years of experience firm-wide as top-ranking leaders in the Department of Justice and the nation’s preeminent Big Law firms. We achieve remarkable results for our clients in complex litigation, government investigations, and criminal defense. We also provide highly sought-after advice in areas relating to privacy breach, cybersecurity, and compliance.
